about_text: I was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Since I can remember, I have felt a deep connection with the land and the life around me...
about_message_text: Art is an endless journey, a window to the soul and the nature that surrounds us...
about_message_highlight: Art is not only observed, it is lived.
contact_description: If you have any questions or want more information about my work, send me a message.
contact_success: Your message has been successfully sent!
delivery_description: Learn about shipping times, costs, and protection measures for our artworks.
delivery_times_text: National shipping: 5-7 business days. International shipping: 10-15 business days.
delivery_methods_text: We work with DHL, FedEx, and UPS to ensure the best delivery service.
delivery_costs_text: Costs vary depending on location and artwork size.
delivery_packing_text: Each artwork is wrapped in protective material and carefully packed.
faq_question_1: How can I track my order?
faq_question_2: What if my artwork arrives damaged?
